name: Colonize 2593
description:
A small strategy game I made for "GMTK Game Jam 2020".

The theme was "Out of Control". With my game I tried to slowly but surely take control of the player's colony, so that he is finally out of control.
I hope you have fun playing!

In the next days I will publish a devlog on my Youtube channel. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxFlxJf2OZ_1mrEIPa3YD6w/

Music: https://gooseninja.itch.io/space-music-pack
